Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory673.jpg'}
{1: 'Constellia'}

{1: '1', 3: 'In Constellia, the massive prediction machine stands quietly, covered in colorful blinking lights. The mechanoid girl with white hair takes her place beside it, inspecting every set of data in her hands.'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Clear loaded simulation history.', 4: '1'}
{3: '"History cleared."'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Reload the memory data—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'An untimely ring comes out of nowhere, interrupting Dulcinea. She pauses the simulation machine and answers the call.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory579.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'How are things, Dulcinea?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "Constellia is doing well. I'm performing a new series of simulations.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Is it for a new "Palette Clash"?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "No, it isn't.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Palette Clash was carried out based on the possibility of Constellia encountering conflict. It was a full-scale simulation with a known goal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'This time, the simulation has no known goal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'A simulation with no known goal?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Cervantes seems very intrigued by Dulcinea's new project."}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "Similar to Palette Clash, I've borrowed some data samples from a Golden Age game to build a new simulation platform, hoping to find a different ending through it.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'The main data sample comes from the individual named Echo. I\'ve built a simulation platform called "Guardian of Order" for her. The ""Guardian of Order"" needs to clear five stages to reclaim the "Codex of Order".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'I hope that I can simulate her course on the surface through this game.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '...Is this the lady named Echo who visited Constellia with Ayla before being taken away by that suit of armor?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Indeed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Why did you think of using her as the main data sample for this simulation?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "Her M.I.N.D. was incredibly complex, and the armor hid many secrets I couldn't decipher as well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "With a special individual like this... I'm curious to find out what new impacts can be produced when such broken data clashes with different variables.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Do you want to witness the new results of this simulation with me, Cervantes?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Cervantes does not reject Dulcinea's offer. He takes a small step back, giving himself a better view of the simulation machine's screen."}
{3: 'The mechanoid girl turns toward the simulation machine and gives the data samples one last look.'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Reload the memory data. Begin simulation—', 4: '1'}
